headline: Global Cosmetics Market Competitive Landscape Report 2025: Key Players Analysis, Company Profiles, Strategic Developments, Mergers, Product Innovations, Revenue Insights, and Future Forecasts to 2033
summary: The Global Cosmetics Market is set for significant growth, projected to leap from US$ 346.1 billion in 2025 to US$ 526.74 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 5.39%. This growth is driven by soaring demand for vegan cosmetics, product innovation, personal grooming awareness, and e-commerce expansion. Major players like Coty, P&G, Estee Lauder, Colgate-Palmolive, and Johnson & Johnson lead the market. As trends emphasize health, organic, and cruelty-free products, companies like Revlon and Beiersdorf

summary: The global household cleaning products market, valued at USD 41.66 billion in 2025, is projected to reach USD 61.50 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 4.99%. headline: Assessing Procter & Gamble (PG) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Tide Evo Launch
summary: Procter & Gamble (PG) is back in focus after topping fiscal second quarter earnings expectations, drawing analyst upgrades and renewed attention to its mix of new products, including the nationwide launch of Tide evo. See our latest analysis for Procter & Gamble. Those product launches and the earnings beat have coincided with a clear shift in sentiment, with the share price at US$165.17 and a 30 day share price return of 10% feeding into a 5 year total shareholder return of 50.76%. This...
